title: Joshua Ferris on ‘The Dinner Party’
description: Ferris talks about his new collection of stories, and Jonathan Taplin discusses “Move Fast and Break Things: How Facebook, Google, and Amazon Cornered Culture and Undermined Democracy.”
author: books@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
